Package org.apache.turbine.modules

Interface Assembler

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Action, Layout, Navigation, Page, ScheduledJob, Screen
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessController, ActionEvent, BaseJspNavigation, BaseJspScreen, DefaultAction, DefaultPage, DefaultSessionValidator, DirectResponseLayout, InitContextsAction, InvalidState, JSONScreen, JSONSecureScreen, JspErrorScreen, JspLayout, JspPage, LegacyVelocityAction, LegacyVelocityNavigation, LegacyVelocityScreen, LegacyVelocitySecureAction, LegacyVelocitySecureScreen, LoginUser, LogoutUser, PlainJSONScreen, PlainJSONSecureAnnotatedScreen, RawScreen, SessionValidator, TemplateNavigation, TemplatePage, TemplateScreen, TemplateSecureSessionValidator, TemplateSessionValidator, VelocityAction, VelocityActionEvent, VelocityCachedLayout, VelocityCachedScreen, VelocityDirectLayout, VelocityDirectScreen, VelocityErrorScreen, VelocityLayout, VelocityNavigation, VelocityOnlyLayout, VelocityPage, VelocityScreen, VelocitySecureAction, VelocitySecureScreen, VelocityXslLayout
    public interface Assembler
    This is an interface that defines what an Assembler is. All the current modules extend off of this class. It is currently empty and future use is yet to be determined.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Dave Bryson, Peter Courcoux
